DOC.brief_summary: We hypothesize stroke volume variation measure use commercially available LiDCO monitor provide reasonable estimate volume compare standard measure . This study collate data already collect bedside nurse .
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To compare measurement stroke volume variance intake/output measurement , weight , BUN/Creatnine value , central venous pressure . Design : Non-experimental , non-randomized observational comparative study . Setting : The sixteen bed Neurocritical Care Unit Duke University Hospital . Patients : 45 adult ( 18 year ) subject intracranial pathology require volume resuscitation . Only patient current LiDCO monitoring consider eligible inclusion study . Interventions : This observational study . Subjects receive standard-of-care treatment without additional intervention . Data Analysis : All data collect principal investigator / study coordinator . Personal patient information remove ( deidentified ) permanent data collection record protect patient confidentiality . Data collect enter Microsoft Excel electronic spreadsheet save USB Disk drive store locked cabinet investigator 's office . Statistical analysis use SAS v9.1 , ( Cary , NC ) conduct level significance set .05 ( alpha ) use standardize comparative analysis technique .
